content: This game as a Sub Sim is actually really good once you know how it should be played. I tried the demo n it took a while to overlook the graphics but once gameplay kicked in, I loved it. Its really addictive n can get really action packed. I originally refunded the game to the misunderstanding it was bugged, so I repurchased it again once this misunderstanding was explained. Hoping to see if the Dev will add rough seas n weather conditions in the future, Uboats look amazing in rough seas.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review ! The ships jump when the option "Realistic sensors accuracy" is enabled, it seems a bug but simulates the uncertainty of the sensors. This option can be disabled in the "Option screen". A more detailed explanation can be found in the Instruction web site, in the "Option screen" page, thanks ! Dimitri

content: Best submarine for me rn... Keep up the good update ðŸ¤™
Its been a long time and this game still a hit personally, i love it.
ty for lots of cant verify and keeping me on my toes going back to town to verify purchace.

Reminds me old c64 silent hunter. For us real gamers,it's about the game not pretty graphics. This game is a very good start. I already see improvements on the way. Love it so far. Love the new periscope. I dont understand the camera view boxes on the right side.. the white ones...other than that, the sim seems tight... Now 20019. Very satisfied with the improvement! Needs a career mode. Great time killer :)
I love it, I'll give a longer review later ;)
Awesome!
An amazing sum sim. Perfect for when I'm not at my computer and can't play Wolfpack.
"Unfortunately u boat simulator has stopped."

Tried this a few years ago,was promising. Surprised to find it again - Good Improvenent! Worth getting FULL GAME app. Quite small size,few MB! Thank you for continuing U-Boat Simulator,for Android. Yay... (p.s. ; Sorry you went through all that G+ stuff...)
Possibly one of the coolest Submarine Sims I've ever played. and the fact that it's for smartphone makes it even better. if subsims are your genre this is definitely the game for you.
stupid we
Perfect. This is the perfect game if you are looking for a cool u-boat sim. 10/10.
a classic
finally my fav developer is back

A strategic simulated submarine game ,best tried in the free version,but the full paid version less than a cup of coffee is certainly very worthwhile.This the first and only game that I felt inclined to purchase and not disappointed that I did, as it helps the developer to continue his ongoing efforts to improve it even more.This is a great and absorbing game ,that just keeps getting even better.
Thanks..best submarine simulator...its feel like that you are a true sub captain..
Awesome
Great game had it on Android. Does this not work on Google Phones?

A real 'computer game' for those who know what that is (^__^) now with more periscope! Simple 3d is fitting and perfect for the game style. I love seeing torpedo hits light up the enemy ships...KABOOM!! A must for anyone into strategy, warfare, retro games, "serious games", submarines... Its awesome! Now terrain makes navigating meaningful. Amazing developer is very friendly and always making this killer game better! 100 Stars!!!
replyContent:
Hi Aaron, thanks for your review !
I am preparing the land/bathymetry in these days :-)
Not easy, I will need some weeks or more to complete it, but I put a nice screenshot of the first experiment on the Facebook page :-)
(It is not needed to be registered on Facebook to see it).
Have a nice day :-)

content: Excellent submarine sim!
replyContent: Hi :-) Perhaps I fixed the bug and today I released a new version of the game (V1.33) in the Google Play Store. I hope it works well now, Dimitri

content: Perfect

The title of the game is self-explanatory. Graphics is subpar at best, and 
the ship models are nothing to be marvelled upon. Gameplay wise: fantastic. 
I absolutely recommend it for subsim fans seeking for a nice Type VII 
U-Boot adventure on their mobile phones.
please update this game, I can't hit a torpedo when u bot dive on 20 meter, meanwhile your tutorial can hit from 20?
replyContent: Hi Deffy, the video tutorials on YouTube are very old and not very accurate... the max depth for launching torpedo is 8 meters. I don't know when I will be able to create new video turials... All the accurate instructions are in the web site here : www.uboatsimulator.com

content: Great little game with the right amount of game dynamics. Graphics, yes, crude, but otherwise everything that a uboat simulator should be great at! Hope you're alright, Dmitri, you seem to have vanished 2015.  BTW on Google 5x only black screen - says compatible - not a tablet though.
replyContent: Hi, I was lost in the depth of the ocean :-) Perhaps I fixed the bug and today I released a new version of the game (V1.33) in the Google Play Store. I hope it works well now, Dimitri

content: Graphics are crude. Game play is so much fun. Controls were a little hard at fist and... I don't know how it could be improved... but a very fun game.
If you were playing Silent Service back in the 80's then this is for you. Love it.

This game is awesome its like if this game was released on Windows 95. The gameplay stabs you in the balls with fun and sea superiority, just be sure you don't sink the titanic, it don't have no dog in the fight.
Can you add like view of inside submarine  like silent hunter 3 and choosing submarine?
The Game is great the graphics don't matter its only the game play and this is pretty realistic with random ships and planes popping in I loved it
Very good tactical sim that reminds me of the old PC classics. Well worth the asking price.  Dev are you going to finish the 3D models by adding textures?
Super fun game!
I've used Androids exclusively since 2011. It's now 2017 and this is the only app I've ever decided to actually buy. I don't usually play games on my phone either. This game is really cool. Love it.
Different ships design for allied and enemy, great game
Will not run on new android operating sysrem.Below 6.0 runs fine needs update.Very good simulator..
replyContent: Hi, I am playing now on my old S3 with CyanogenMod 13 (Android 6.0.1) and it runs well, please inform me if you find problems on other devices with Android 6.0 or greater, thanks !

content: Great game
Ð‘Ñ€Ð°Ð²Ð¾!
Hours of fun.  Would be fun to play as a destroyer.

Sometimes when I am hunting ships and a lone small merchant is spotted by sensors I will go to the location and be exactly where the game says it but there is no ship there. But otherwise its like the silent hunter of the mobile world WELL DONE
replyContent: Hi Luke, difficult to explain here with few words, often units are not shown in the exact position. I suggest to see in the instructions (www.UBoatSimulator.com) the "Map" page for "dashed symbols", and the "Options-screen" page for the "Realistic sensors accuracy" :-)

content: Great game
Reminds me of an old game Gato. Well done here. Are you updating this still?
replyContent: Thanks ! I am having some problems in this period, but I would like to go on with the development as soon as possible ! Dimitri

content: I'm just trying to figure everything out on this game the price was right so it's worth that much for sure after I figuring it out and like it i,ll give 5 stars      for sure
Definately one of the more satisfying sub sims out there.  Can't wait for further updates, thank you!

Wow! What a great game. Just proves that fantastic graphics don't always a great game make. This is a great U-Boat sim that costs less than a crappy cup of coffee at Starbucks. That said, however, kicking the graphics up a notch, or adding some textures would be nice :) Suggestions: Maybe a campaign / career mode?  Maybe some different boats? Maybe some historical missions?
Tottaly worth it

Fantastic game! It is a little tough at first (like Dimitri says) but it's real cool once you get the hang of it. Hope we can add some more goodies like upgrades (Alberich coating, Bold canisters, schnorkels, etc.) in the future.
Evertime i started a new game or mission it seems to start me on land. And we all know boats dont work on landmasses very well. Lol
replyContent: Hi, it is strange and should not happen... missions don't have lands... please inform me if it happens again, thanks !

content: I love this game, but now that the terrain is out I'd like to know when there will be ports or towns just to add to the landscape. Maybe even a few simple tasks like sink commercial ships or warships. And maybe you can add in some submarine modificatioms, like longer oxygen time, better battery, etc.Thanks for this great game.
replyContent: Hi Brian :-) I had to pause the development for some months, because I have to move to an other house... I should be ready to continue the development in February, I am sorry for this long pause !! Dimitri

content: Obviously a labour of love from the developer. Really fun gameplay. All the essentials for a super sub Sim. Clever and simple. Just what I've been waiting for. Well done and thank you for all your hard work. May i suggest making the look and sound of the sea itself a tiny bit more realistic to enhance the feeling of travel? Perhaps with some bobbing, waves and rust on the sub. I'd also like to rescue those in lifeboats! Oh and a swordfish decal! It would however be only the cherry on a super cake.

Tried the demo..failed miserably, read the instructions and had moderate success. found out the key features of this game (for repairs & reload/refuel) are in the paid version.....it's totally worth the price of a cup of coffee for a solid phone game to kill time.   fix request: When I hit a target head on with torpedo's the targets health is not updating properly and I tend to fire more torpedo's only to find out it was already sinking.  Feature suggestion: ability to course correct on map and view screens

This game concept is so cool...whats left is just some more addons like more sub types available for you to play, as you know German U-Boats are so cool, especially Type VII, XXI, IX, I & don't miss out the coastal U-Boats too...Next is the vessel models, in which not all vessel should look the same, the allies and enemies. Hope you can prioritise that first, looking forward to that.
A first class sim, highly recommended and very very enjoyable. Excellent, thanks !!
EDIT 9/10/15: I am really impressed with the amount of content added since I bought this. By far the best mobile game I've purchased.  Please do another one with modern subs.
Don't usually write reviews but here it goes.....it was everything I was hoping for. I recommend this game to anyone interested in maritime combat. This is pretty hard to beat
It is a good game
It's a really good sim its what I was looking for.
5 min. in every time all the time. use to work at least 50% of the time.GREAT game .....wen it werkz.peace.co.rd
Getting even better with updates.
but I would love to see actual missions to do,  instead of just roaming around killing anything in sight. maybe earn credits to upgrade our sub (just an idea)  Great job on the game.
replyContent: Thanks Aaron :-) Missions are under tests in the beta version, probably they will be available at the end of the next week for all players :-) Simple missions for the moment, but all players will be able to build their missions !

content: Wish it had a tutorial though. Very difficult to know what you're meant to be doing
After reading the detailed instructions. ...I knew this was a serious programmer and that the game would be great.
I love Silent Hunter series...now a good sub Sim for my android tablet.
I love playing this to pass the time, but since the latest update the game crashes every 15-20 minutes and i lose all my progress, samsung galaxy s3
replyContent: Hi James, thanks for your bug report, it seems a strange problem inside an Android library, perhaps a memory problem, I am not able to reproduce it on my S3. Please can you try to reboot your device and contact me by email if this doesn't solve the problem ? Thanks !

content: The best. Note 4

IF you truly enjoy tactical submarine simulations you'll absolutely love this very detailed game.  Are some things done for the sake of use-ability? Yes.  But you'll be glad because that frees you up to focus on tactics and trust me, you'll need them big time.  Takes me back to my days playing MicroProse simulations and that is a great compliment indeed.  :)
Look at the title.:)
Since the last update and the new map showing landmasses the game seems a bit 'laggy'
replyContent: Hi Dene, I agree, the drawing of the map should be optimized, no idea how to do it now... to decrease the slowdown I suggest to disable the option "Enable HiRes for terrain on map", it can help a bit to make the user interface more responsive by drawing the map with a lower resolution.

content: For SH3 fan like me this game is a wonderful opportunity to have the closest to pc sim experience on my android device. I am glad to see such games in the market, they bring the old school gaming spirit. Ver.1.26 works perfectly on tegra 2.
replyContent:
I apologize, I made an error in V1.25 :-(
I uploaded now the new V1.26, I hope it will fix the bug !

content: This is a great subsim! Would like to see a screen like Silent Service that has depth,  plane angle,  etc that looks like the inside of the sim.

For anyone who ever played silent hunter/silent service, this is a flashback to then. Who needs "amazing" graphics when you've got proper game play, just need the missions the developer is promising in the future, but it holds up strong as it is.
I just want to support a one dev team. If i understand how to play i'll rate it better. No permission asked? Very well

I'm not usually one to take the time to rate apps, but this game is well deserving of an excellent rating. A lot of time and effort has been put into this game. I've been looking for a good sub simulator for a good while, and this is exactly what I've been looking for. Well worth the money for the full version!
This is a really good sub game. Need to make one now that is a more modern version

As of the time of this review, I've sunk a big merchant ship and a cruise liner and it wasn't too difficult, it was actually quite enjoyable. This is one of only a few games that I've bought this year, but it is certainly one of the best. I've played (or at least tried) the Silent Hunter games on the PC, but never got very far. This game might not be quite the same, but it certainly is good, especially considering the platform. Simply put, it is an awesome game!! My thanks to the developer!! :D
Of what little I have played, I have thoroughly enjoyed this "serious" android game. Nice to see an update already rolled out, and all the success to you
Job well done Vassy!! Keep up the great work! This app has come a long way and continues to get better every update.
Really good game looking forward to seeing the next updates.
I can't play the game!
replyContent:
Hi Bryce, what happens ? If possible please send me an email, I can try to help :-)
 For the game instructions, please see here : http://www.UBoatSimulator.com

content: Thoroughly enjoyed the gameplay. Happy to of purchased the game.
Even better with periscope view
Top game just gets better would love a periscope view would be awesome.woop woop periscope on new update
replyContent: Hi John, thanks :-) It is in preparation, I hope it will be ready in few months !

content: It would be great if you coud control multiple U-boats, have ranks and edit the name of the U-boats.  Anyway, its a fantastic game!
Simple graphics complex gameplay, good work

Totally lacking any fancy graphics, bells or whistles, just pure good old fashioned gameplay.  Would benefit from more context (like a proper map, rather than a featureless rectangle of sea with ships randomly wandering around.
This has got to be one of the best simulations  of any kind on an Android platform.
U'LL LOVE this game ;)

This game is how all these phone games should be. It may not be glamorous with fancy graphics, but no in app purchases no ads make it my go to game. Fun and challenging trying to sink enemy ships. A little tricky learning the controls. My hat is off to the developers keeping It real!  I'm excited to periscope views â˜º
Nice sim/game and a good example of an active and responsive dev. Keep up the good work! (and up periscope, lol)
If you like a strong, intelligent strategy game get this. .

I really love this game, and can't wait for all the future updates like 3D and periscope and such. I would really love it if you implemented a "world map" with land and ports, and the entirety of the Atlantic, and maybe even the Pacific. And in those ports, like in the Silent Hunter series you can find ships which you can sink :P. also, can you implement a "lock" feature for torpedo targeting like in Silent Hunter? i find that my torpedo targeting skills are lacking. This would be great :D I really love the game, and appreciate all the effort you put into it :) I really think this game has much, much potential!
Pacfic fleet is also a good game, you should pick the good things from it.

If you like the silent hunter series of sub games and don't mind the lack of outside world view because all the play is done in tactical map view then run n buy this game I tried the free demo and wow anyone giving less then 5 stars didn't really try it or figured it out
My favorite movie as a kid was Enemy Below with Robert Mitchem.  This little game lets me play the part of that couragous uboat captain!  I seldom play games on my phone.  This one is an exception.
One of the best games I ever Downloaded

Great little game. Like the Avalon Hill Game Submarine. If you like military sims this one us a gem.    Suggestion? Some way to track high scores and scenarios. Good job to the developers of this game!
Didn't expect much but it turned out to be a fun game! Please update soon.  If you like subsims ......buy it!!

I was running the demo and spent the two bucks and now it wont run at all.  Tried everything, including rebooting device, clearing old versions.  Tried contacting google play and they want to put me on their treadmill rather then refund me
replyContent: Hi Andrew, I am sorry for it ! When the app is started for the first time, it checks online if it was downloaded from Google Play; it could be a temporary problem with Google servers, or a network problem. If the problems persist, please contact me by mail so with more details I can try to solve the problem, thanks !

content: Love it, finally my real live submarine I can take any where, imagine if we can detect others that have this app and get into a sea battle?

You need to watch the tutorials, but it's particularly fun and addictive once you get the hang of it.   It'd be neat if there were more things to do with the sub, and if you got some sort of feedback on whether or not you were detected. Getting pinged by sonar or something would be neat.
Just gets better
Great game which just gets better month by month
A game you can play put it down and just plays again. I would love a periscope and book of ships. Also a way to progress such as rank increases. Good game though.
Love it
Excellent game,excellent updates. Getting better all the time.  Would be cheap at thrice the price. More naval sims! !!!
replyContent: Hi and thank you for your review! I fixed some bugs in the last V1.6 and the supply sub should be ok :-)

content: Love this game! Looking forward to future improvements.  May I suggest changing gun ranges? For example, battleship guns have a range much higher than 1Nm. Keep up the great work!
replyContent: Hi Simon, thanks for your hint :-) As soon as possible I will change range and damage for every different gun in the game !

content: A very fun game that involves math and careful placement.
started as a pastime now every time i play i feel like a i own the u-boat sinking as much and as safely add as much tonnage as possible try addictive
Excellent sub sim, only a few things missing from bigger sims , but including them might make the app less fun.
Good game!! Wish their was more visual effects. Also a little better targeting and identifying system. Once you get the hang of it its great. Hope they develop a modern sub game.

Best game on google play. Would love to see enemy aircraft being able to report your position and drop depth charges . Also mr Dimitri if at any time you feel like making a cold war version of this game that would be awesome.  Sub on sub, hunter killers shadowing boomers and so on :)
replyContent: Hi Jude, thank you very much for your review and advice ! I begin to prepare the aircrafts and I insert enemy submarines in the to-do list :-)

content: I think this is going to be a great game, I used to love playing Silent Hunter and games like that years ago.  Needs some UI love for color coding ranges and small things like that. I cannot get the call for resupply to work, so you end up starting over after you run out of torpedoes.
replyContent: Hi Jason, thanks for your review ! I am sorry, the resupply is very important, I confirm that it works. To call the Transport it is needed to stop at surface and wait for it to be free (IDLE), then it can be called and after it is important to not move. If possible check its chapter in the instruction site, there are also some tutorials on YouTube

content: Super fun and addictive :-)
Like Silent Hunter but light weight for phones and tabs. Great

It's not anywhere perfect, controls could do with an overhaul. Having said that, I love playing it, the support is excellent and improvements are continuously being made. I highly recommend this simulator.
Have tried many. This is the best. Like real time war game. To rearm and refuel both subs need to be 0 speed 0 depth. Excellent. Happy to pay 1.99 for a game like this.
Fun game. But I can't figure out how to get the resupply sub to resupply me.
replyContent: Hi :-) Here I have only 350 characters for the answer, if possible try to see the help site, it explains the procedure to call the Torpedoes Transport for refuelling (some bugs were fixed in the V1.6, sorry for it)

content: Simple and very addictive,  doesn't appear to be any way to survive a depth charge attack though...   I got sunk by a Carrier ?...

Very good game, finally a sub game worth its weight in tonnage.  Lots of room for improvement, but an amazing platform to build on.  Can't wait to see what's on the horizon for this one.   Would like to see an ability to change course, depth and speed all on same screen, and maybe some kind of a speed multiplier slider of sorts.  Again, great game.
